knimeNode.name: Sum Formula
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to generate molecular formulas based on a given mass input.

fullDescription.intro: Generates sum formulas based on a given mass. The mass tolerance limit is 0.05 amu. The formula generator assumes masses to be major isotopic masses. The 'valid sum' of the generated sum formulas is also given. It ranges between 0 and 1 indicating if any of the applied rules for evaluating the validity of a formula has been violated. Rules used are 'ElementRule', 'MMElementRule', 'NitrogenRule', and 'RDBERule' (defined in CDK API). All rule parameters are set to default. 'Exclusion' removes all formulas with a valid sum of 0.
fullDescription.option: Remove sum formulas that appear to be unlikely.

ports.outPort: Input table plus calculated sum formulas.
